original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽17.7. Kusalattika, Dassanattika🔽Akusalaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  kusala attika dassana attika  akusalam dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The forward and reverse order of conditions, the Tipitaka, the Paṭṭhāna text🔽The profitable triad, the seeing triad🔽With an unprofitable state subject to arising by seeing as condition there is an unprofitable state subject to arising by seeing. (Abbreviated.) With an unprofitable state subject to arising by development as condition there is an unprofitable state subject to arising by development. (Abbreviated.) With an indeterminate state not subject to arising by either seeing or development as condition there is an indeterminate state not subject to arising by either seeing or development. (Abbreviated.)

original: Akusalaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Abyākataṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato nanevadassanena
analyzed: akusalam bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  abyākatam na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paccayā na abyākataḥ na na iva dassanena
translated: With an unprofitable state subject to arising by development as condition there is an unprofitable state subject to arising by development. (Abbreviated.) With an unprofitable state subject to arising by development as condition there is an unprofitable state subject to arising by development. (Abbreviated.) With an unprofitable state subject to arising by development as condition there is an unprofitable state subject to arising by development. (Abbreviated.)

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With an indeterminate state not subject to arising by either seeing or development as condition there is an indeterminate state not subject to arising by either seeing or development. (Abbreviated.) With an indeterminate state not subject to arising by either seeing or development as condition there is an indeterminate state not subject to arising by either seeing or development. (Abbreviated.) With an indeterminate state not subject to arising by either seeing or development as condition there is an indeterminate state not subject to arising by either seeing or development. (Abbreviated.)
